overview: Parts 1, 2, 3 Digitally Re-Mastered including some new contents and new songs by James Coffey - Where Have All The Cabooses Gone, My Mama Was A Train, & Workin In The Railway Yard.  I Love Toy Trains, Part 2(32 minutes)  Prewar classics like the Blue Comet, circus action, how farmers grow food, Santa Fe Super Chief, the real Norfolk & Western J and Southern Pacific Daylight. Beethoven s 5th. Blue Angels Air Show, I've Been Workin' on the Railroad. Loading coal and culverts, fire scene, transfer table, bascule bridge and magnetic crane in action. I'm A Train, Wonderful World of Trains. Classics like the Lionel Blue Comet, State Set and the Ives Black Diamond in action. Fireworks.
title: I Love Toy Trains: Part 2
